title: Zoe Lister-Jones: The Power of Being a Weirdo
description:
When Zoe Lister-Jones was a kid, she was not a fan of horror movies. But The Craft was different. It spoke to her and a lot of other self-proclaimed weirdos out there. Now, she’s keeping the story alive — and adding a few new lessons — in her new film, The Craft: Legacy.

Follow Zoe on Instagram and Twitter

Follow The Craft: Legacy on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook

Watch The Craft: Legacy on demand everywhere today

Zoe’s photo credit: Daryl Wein

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App.

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
